database.name: VIEW SFPSI_RECONCILE_SO_V
database.view: SELECT ol.c_orderline_id AS sfpsi_reconcile_so_v_id, ol.ad_client_id, ol.ad_org_id, ol.createdby, ol.created, ol.updatedby, ol.updated, ol.isactive, bp.c_bpartner_id, o.c_order_id, ol.c_orderline_id, ol.m_product_id, ol.c_uom_id, ol.qtyordered, ol.qtyinvoiced, ol.qtyordered - ol.qtyinvoiced AS qty FROM c_orderline ol JOIN c_order o ON o.c_order_id = ol.c_order_id AND o.issotrx = 'Y' AND o.docstatus = 'CO' JOIN c_bpartner bp ON bp.c_bpartner_id = ol.c_bpartner_id WHERE ol.qtyordered > ol.qtyinvoiced
